column13: Indonesian designation Hadjar Dewantoro; designed mainly as training ship
Iraqi designation Ababeel-50; probably more ordered but not delivered
J-21E or J-1L version; incl some RJ-21E or RJ-1L reconnaissance version
Original 20 ordered but probably only 12 delivered before destruction of production facility in Yugoslav civil war; deal incl barter
Originally produced for African country but cancelled and sold to Myanmar
Improved Y-301 version; produced under licence in Myanmar
Second-hand but modernized before delivery; Sudanese designation Fashoda
NJ-21E version; possibly incl 2 RJ-21E reconnaissance version
